metadata.title: CVE-2016-2854 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description: The aufs module for the Linux kernel 3.x and 4.x does not properly maintainPOSIX ACL xattr data, which allows local users to gain privileges byleveraging a group-writable setgid directory.

criterions.comment: linux-azure package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-5.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-azure-5.11, was needs-triage').
linux-azure-5.11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-azure-5.13, was needs-triage').

linux-gke-5.15: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
